name: Automata - Fix (New)
description: Evaluates advanced Java debugging skills under time constraints, focusing on real-world problem-solving in software development environments. Assesses ability to identify and resolve complex code errors efficiently.

name: Core Java (Entry Level) (New)
description: Designed for entry-level candidates, this test measures proficiency in Java syntax, object-oriented programming principles, and basic algorithm implementation. Includes questions on inheritance, polymorphism, and exception handling.

name: Technology Professional 8.0 Job Focused Assessment
description: Combines technical aptitude with behavioral evaluation for mid-to-senior tech roles. Tests collaboration skills, problem-solving agility, and adaptability in fast-paced environments.

name: Verify - Verbal Ability - Next Generation
description: Measures reading comprehension, vocabulary, and written communication skills. Critical for roles requiring report writing or client-facing communication.

name: Entry Level Sales 7.1 (International)
description: Evaluates foundational sales techniques, customer engagement strategies, and ability to handle objections in international markets. Includes scenarios on cross-cultural communication.

name: Motivation Questionnaire MQMS
description: Assesses workplace motivators like achievement, autonomy, and work-life balance. Ideal for leadership roles to ensure cultural alignment.

name: Search Engine Optimization (New)
description: Tests technical SEO knowledge including keyword research, on-page optimization, and Google Analytics interpretation. Validates expertise for digital marketing roles.

name: Manual Testing (New)
description: Focuses on manual QA methodologies like test case design, defect tracking, and regression testing. Includes hands-on scenarios for software testing roles.

name: Bank Administrative Assistant - Short Form
description: Evaluates clerical accuracy, data entry speed, and familiarity with financial terminology. Tailored for banking and finance support roles.

name: SHL Verify Interactive - Inductive Reasoning
description: Measures logical reasoning through pattern recognition and sequence analysis. Critical for analytical roles like data scientists or engineers.

name: Computer Science (New)
description: Covers core CS concepts: algorithms, data structures, and system design. Validates theoretical knowledge for software engineering positions.

name: Occupational Personality Questionnaire OPQ32r
description: Comprehensive personality assessment measuring traits like resilience, influence, and innovation. Used for executive roles like COO.

name: General Entry Level â€“ Data Entry 7.0 Solution
description: Tests typing speed (WPM), accuracy, and basic spreadsheet navigation. Designed for administrative support candidates.

name: Agile Software Development
description: Assesses understanding of Agile frameworks (Scrum/Kanban), sprint planning, and iterative development processes.

name: SVAR - Spoken English (Indian Accent) (New)
description: Evaluates spoken English proficiency with focus on Indian accents. Includes role-plays for customer service and sales scenarios.
